alert.note: Alert for Iowa; Sauk (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 12:57AM CDT until July 24 at 1:45AM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Milwaukee/Sullivan has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Iowa County in south central Wisconsin... Southern Sauk County in south central Wisconsin... * Until 145 AM CDT. * At 1256 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Richland Center to 8 miles southeast of Muscoda to 10 miles northwest of Mineral Point, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Dodgeville, Prairie Du Sac, Sauk City, Mineral Point, Spring Green, Barneveld, Highland, Arena, Plain, Bluffview, North Freedom, Ridgeway, Avoca, Linden, Waldwick, Cobb, Rock Springs, Clyde, Loganville and Rewey. This includes the following Locations Hyde`s Mill, The House on the Rock, and Iowa-Grant School. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
